messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] New Unschooling List for Eugene, Oregon Area Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Anybody can add their own group to the NHEN database. Go to this link and follow the instructions for add your listing :
messages.messageBody:
On Sep 2, 2004, at 6:23 PM, jenneferh2000 wrote:

> f you have an unschooling website, I would appreciate it if you
> could add a link to it in order to spread the word!
>
> Also, feel free to pass this info on to whoever you think may be
> interested.
>

Anybody can add their own group to the NHEN database. Go to this link
and follow the instructions for "add your listing":
<http://www.nhen.org/support/groups/browse.asp>

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: New Unschooling List for Eugene, Oregon Area Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Wow!  That was easy!  Thanks so much for the advice.  I just created a new yahoo group list for Eugene area unschoolers.  You can view the description and join
messages.messageBody:
Wow! That was easy! Thanks so much for the advice. I just created
a new yahoo group list for Eugene area unschoolers. You can view the
description and join if you'd like at:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EugeneAreaUnschoolers

(Feedback on the description would be appreciated too as that was the
hard part!)

If you have an unschooling website, I would appreciate it if you
could add a link to it in order to spread the word!

Also, feel free to pass this info on to whoever you think may be
interested.

-Jennefer
